name: Spy Rider
overview: Reminiscent of the Spy Hunter series but with a flair of it's own, this game in which you do battel on both land and sea won 6th place in the (Shoot 'em Up Constructiion Set) SEUCK Compo 2013 competition and was included as a sample game in the updated release of the Shoot 'Em Up Destruction Set 4 the following year.
